ModifierOrder.description:
Description

Enforces the modifier order recommended by the JLS. Apart from sorting modifiers,
this rule also enforces that all annotations appear before all modifier keywords.
By setting the propertytypeAnnotations, you can also enforce that type
annotations appear right of the modifier keywords, next to the type they apply to.
This property can have three values:

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
ModifierOrder.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
typeAnnotations	anywhere	Whether type annotations should be placed next to the type they qualify and not before modifiers.One of:anywhere,onDecl,onType
